activities:
Bede Scientific Incorporated is the sales and service office for the North American region of the company's activities. The corporate officers are board memebers and/or staff of the global company,ie, they are UK citizens. Personal information (home address and phone) is sometimes required by third parties. 
Certain human resource information of the UK employees is sometimes (rarely) shared with the US office. This information is only shared with third parties when explicit permission is granted.
